articles.title: Sources -- NBA fines Warriors owner Joe Lacob $500,000 for decrying 'unfair' NBA luxury tax
articles.description: The NBA fined Golden State Warriors owner Joe Lacob $500,000 on Wednesday for his recent comments on a podcast discussing the league's collective bargaining, sources told ESPN's Adrian Wojnarowski.
articles.content: The NBA fined Golden State Warriors owner Joe Lacob $500,000 for violating the league's policy on publicly discussing collective bargaining talks, which included Lacob describing the league's luxury … [+1499 chars]

articles.author: Paolo Uggetti
articles.title: California governor Gavin Newsom demands UCLA explain how leaving Pac-12 for Big Ten is beneficial
articles.description: California governor Gavin Newsom said Wednesday that he demands an explanation, on behalf of the public, for just how UCLA's move to the Big Ten will be beneficial for not just student athletes, but the history of their partnership with UC Berkeley.

articles.title: Clemson's Dabo Swinney: Win or lose, 'they're going to criticize'
articles.description: Clemson coach Dabo Swinney said he wasn't concerned about how the narrative around Clemson has changed this offseason, with the Tigers no longer considered a playoff shoo-in.

articles.title: Sources -- James Harden's new deal with Philadelphia 76ers includes player option for 2023-24 season
articles.description: James Harden's new deal with the 76ers includes a player option for the 2023-24 season, sources told ESPN's Adrian Wojnarowski, meaning he could become a free agent again next summer.
articles.content:
Free agent James Harden has agreed on a two-year, $68.6 million deal to return to the Philadelphia 76ers, sources told ESPN's Adrian Wojnarowski on Wednesday.
The deal includes a player option for t… [+1110 chars]

articles.title: Kirby Smart: 'Can't get a Florida coach to agree with me' about moving Georgia-Florida game on campus
articles.description: Georgia coach Kirby Smart made a strong case for moving the Georgia-Florida game to the schools' campuses, rather than playing it in Jacksonville, Florida, every season, in an effort to aid recruiting.

articles.title: Charles Johnson, former Pittsburgh Steelers WR and Colorado Buffaloes star, dies at age 50
articles.description: Charles Johnson, a star wide receiver at Colorado and first-round pick of the Steelers, has died at age 50.
articles.content:
Charles Johnson, a star wide receiver at Colorado and first-round pick of the Pittsburgh Steelers, has died at age 50.

articles.title: Texas A&M Aggies football player Ainias Smith arrested on DWI, weapon, marijuana charges
articles.description: Texas A&M receiver Ainias Smith has been arrested on DWI, weapon and marijuana charges. He led the Aggies in both receptions (47) and TD receptions (6) as a team captain last year.

articles.title: NFL Future Power Rankings 2022 - Projections for all 32 teams for the next three seasons
